content: hinds email stringandbean@gmail com ravelry ravelry com/patterns/sources/string-and-bean-designs-ravelry-store emily hinds is a knitter designer and educator living in east tennessee united states her work is characterized by modular knitting techniques rich textures and relaxed contemporary style besides knitting emily s great loves are a strong cup of coffee and a pug named ellie special thanks to heather mclellan at the yarn patch in crossville tn and to megan unthank for their feedback copyright 2023 emily hinds string and bean designs this pattern is intended for personal use only please do not reproduce or distribute without permission version #1 october 2023 page 2 of 2
